name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyder | Control Your Data & Earn Rewards

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyder is creating an internet where you own and get compensated for your data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cyder is a free and simple extension that protects your privacy, blocks creepy ads, and gives you rewards as you browse. The extension has powerful built-in privacy features and the ability to accumulate tokens for gift cards and monthly lottery. 

üîíSecure My Browser: Blocks third-party cookies and sends a "do not track request" to the websites you visit - making it simple to protect your privacy.

üéÅ Cyder Rewards Program: An optional rewards program that provides you tokens while you browse. Tokens are used to redeem hundred of gift card rewards. 

‚úãAdBlock (Beta): Blocks annoying advertisements on your favorite websites, giving you a faster and more secure browsing experience. 

Cyder challenges the status quo to return control and profits from your data back to you. It is simple to use and works seamlessly on your existing browser. Safe to use on both your personal and work device.

Cyder is currently only available for users in Canada or the USA üì•
